mapper.select: select p.pthumbnail, o.ocode, o.scode, o.pcode, p.pname, o.ocount, o.ocharge, o.ostate, o.oshipstate, o.oshipcode, o.ozipcode, o.oaddress, o.omemo, o.odate from orderdb o left outer join listdb p on (o.pcode = p.pcode) where ocode = #{param2} and ucode = (select ucode from userdb where userid = #{param1})
mapper.update: update orderdb set ostate = 3 where ocode = #{param1} and ucode = (select ucode from userdb where userid = #{param2})
